title: Client Displays 'Reconnect' button after draft pick is over, and the actual game window never opens.
body: I haven't been able to actually open the game window after starting a game and picking a champion. This happens in online games and even custom games that only have me as a player. I have tried initiating a full repair, and even reinstalled the game to no avail. Please tell me what could possibly be wrong.

replies.body: If nothing is coming up after champion select, then you could have a connection problem that's failing to transition you over to the game server.  My suggestion would be to start off with the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to remove any blocks that might be causing it, as well as rule out some networking possibilities.  Let me know if that does the trick.

I found a simple yet odd solution, I ran the client as an administrator before creating a game and it allowed it to work.

I downloaded and ran the hextech repair tool but nothing happened. It doesn't even try to connect. The League of Legends game window doesnt even show up on my task bar. As soon as the draft pick ends, i am given the reconnect button. i can click the reconnect button, but nothing happens. Is it a windows security issue? is my computer blocking pop ups from league or something?
I even have this problem with the practice tool.
